strapiArticles.title: eHow
strapiArticles.description: 提供从烹饪到园艺再到手工艺的DIY教程。
strapiArticles.content:
eHow is your go-to resource for all things DIY. From cooking to gardening to crafting, we serve up inspiration that’s instructive and innovative.
从烹饪到园艺再到手工艺，我们提供具有启发性和创新性的灵感。

We work with the best creators on the cutting edge of the DIY space to bring you both fresh ideas and evergreen expertise.
我们与 DIY 领域最前沿的最佳创作者合作，为您带来新鲜的想法和常青的专业知识。

Our mission is to empower people to solve challenges, discover new hobbies and enjoy the creative side of life. It may be called DIY, but we’re here to help.
我们的使命是让人们能够解决挑战、发现新的爱好并享受生活中富有创造力的一面。这可能被称为 DIY，但我们随时为您提供帮助。

siteMetadata.title: 收集优质资源
siteMetadata.author: @learn-anything.cn
siteMetadata.description: 追求极简语言，说明事物因果！
